Aaay-pee-eye

Jun 10, 2014

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

 1 var makeMark = function(resp, lat, lon, rad){
 2             //set color of circle
 3             var colr = (resp == 'yes') ? '#0F0' : '#F00';
 4             var rsvpOpt = {
 5                 strokeColor: colr,

11                 center: new google.maps.LatLng(lat, lon),
12                 radius: rad
13             }    
14 
15             rsvpCirc = new google.maps.Circle(rsvpOpt);
16             //setTimeout(rsvpCirc.setMap(null), 1000);
17                 
18         };

20         var ws = new WebSocket('ws://stream.meetup.com/2/rsvps');
21         //ws.onmessage() = function(msg){makeMark(msg.data);};
22         ws.onmessage = function(msg){
23             //var results = document.getElementById('results');
24             var rsvp = JSON.parse(msg.data);
25             var name = rsvp.member['member_name'];
26             var group = rsvp.group['group_name'];
27             var city = rsvp.group['group_city'];
28             var state = rsvp.group['group_state'];
29             var lat = rsvp.group['group_lat'];
30             var lon = rsvp.group['group_lon'];
31             var resp = rsvp['response'];
32             var rad = 20000;
33             var rp = (resp == 'yes') ? 'will' : "won't";
34             //results.appendChild(document.createTextNode(" * " + name + " " + rp + " meetup with " + group + " in " + city + ', ' + state));
35             //results.appendChild(document.createElement('br'));
36             makeMark(resp, lat, lon, rad);
37         };
